Method Detail

belongsToTheLoggedUser

boolean belongsToTheLoggedUser(java.lang.Long id)
Returns whether the given id represents a valid receipt printer for the logged user

Returns:
true when logged as the member owner of the receipt printer or one of his operators. false otherwise.
